name: Project Siesta Bot
description: A Telegram bot for downloading music from various sources. Deployed via Project-Siesta.

APP_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID from my.telegram.org.

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API hash from my.telegram.org.

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL database URL (e.g., from Heroku Postgres addon). This will be automatically provisioned by Heroku if you use the addon.

ADMINS.description: Space-separated list of Telegram User IDs who are admins of the bot.

WORK_DIR.description: Working directory for the bot. Default is './bot/'.

DOWNLOADS_FOLDER.description: Folder name for downloads within the WORK_DIR. Default is 'DOWNLOADS'.

MAX_WORKERS.description: Maximum concurrent download workers. Default is 5.

RCLONE_CONFIG.description: Contents of rclone.conf file or URL to it (Optional). Needed for rclone uploads.

INDEX_LINK.description: Publicly accessible URL for rclone uploads (Optional).

ENABLE_TIDAL.description: Set to 'True' to enable TIDAL module (Optional)

TIDAL_MOBILE_TOKEN.description: TIDAL Mobile Token (Optional, if ENABLE_TIDAL is True and using mobile session)
